E2000001 80008000

DPad Left  = Switch to Slots 1-4
DPad Right = Switch to Slots 5-6 (Temp Slots 1-2)

Have Six Save Slots v2 (Press Y To Toggle Slots) [Ralf]

DPad Left  = Switch to Slots 1-4
DPad Right = Switch to Slots 5-7 (Temp Slots 1-3)

Common Bank (Hold L And Open Bank) [Ralf]

Common Bank = Slot 7 Bank (Temp Slot 3 Bank)

Bank Selector (Hold DPad Up/Down/Left/Right And Open Bank) [Ralf]
20200574 7C7F1B78
0600BAB0 000000A0
800D8EB8 28000001
40820074 3C808051
8084E270 70800010
4182000C 38A00000
48000030 70800040
4182000C 38A00001
48000020 70800020
4182000C 38A00002
48000010 70800080
4182002C 38A00003
80CDB974 7C062840
4182001C 806DB958
28030000 41820010
1CA52798 38A50420
7C632A14 3C808001
9064C32C 28030000
48205704 800D8EB8
28000001 4082000C
3C608001 8063C32C
7C681B79 48205674
042111BC 4BDFA978
04211230 4BDFA880
E2000001 80008000

DPad Up    - Slot 1 Bank
DPad Left  - Slot 2 Bank
DPad Down  - Slot 3 Bank
DPad Right - Slot 4 Bank

Bank Selector v2 (Hold L + DPad Up/Down/Left/Right And Open Bank) [Ralf]
20200574 7C7F1B78
0600BAA0 000000B0
800D8EB8 28000001
40820084 3C808051
8084E270 70800010
4182000C 38A00000
48000034 70800040
4182000C 38A00001
48000024 70800020
4182000C 38A00002
48000014 70800080
4182003C 38A00003
48000010 74800002
41820008 38A50004
80CDB974 7C062840
4182001C 806DB958
28030000 41820010
1CA52798 38A50420
7C632A14 3C808001
9064C32C 28030000
48205704 800D8EB8
28000001 4082000C
3C608001 8063C32C
7C681B79 48205674
042111BC 4BDFA978
04211230 4BDFA870
E2000001 80008000

DPad Up        - Slot 1 Bank
DPad Left      - Slot 2 Bank
DPad Down      - Slot 3 Bank
DPad Right     - Slot 4 Bank

L + DPad Up    - Slot 5 Bank (Temp Slot 1 Bank)
L + DPad Left  - Slot 6 Bank (Temp Slot 2 Bank)
L + DPad Down  - Slot 7 Bank (Temp Slot 3 Bank)
